example.text: The controversy began in 1987 when the National Institutes of Health, aware of the policy implications of its research, asked for an HHS review of its plan *trace* to implant fetal tissue into the brain of a patient suffering from Parkinson's disease.
example.arg: *trace* -> the National Institutes of Health, aware of the policy implications of its research,
the brain of a patient suffering from Parkinson's disease
